Africa & Middle East Asia & Oceania Europe North America South America FIG. 2: Location of the cities in our dataset and geographical repartition of the different groups. The color of the dots indicates in which group the city falls, as defined on Fig[B. On the bottom of the map, the pie charts display the relative importance of the different groups per continent for cities in our dataset (Group 1: 0.8%, Group 2: 20.9%, Group 3: 77.5%, Group 4: 0.8%). We see that the group 3, composed of cities with blocks of various shapes and a slight predominance of larger areas is by far the most represented group in the world.
